name: Reitti
description: Reitti 是一个自托管的位置跟踪和分析平台,可检测重要地点、行程模式,并与 OwnTracks、GPSLogger 和 Immich 集成。它使用 PostgreSQL + PostGIS、RabbitMQ、Redis 和可选的 Photon 地理编码器。

notes.text: Photon Geocoder running at http://127.0.0.1:2322. Photon is fully setup, but without sample data. (filesize is big) -> checkout our guide: `https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/discussions/8737`.
